top_procedures.description: Established patient office or other outpatient, visit typically 25 minutes
Remote monitoring of physiologic parameters, initial supply of devices with daily recordings or programmed alerts transmission, each 30 days
Established patient office or other outpatient visit, typically 15 minutes
Chronic care management services at least 20 minutes per calendar month
Annual wellness visit, includes a personalized prevention plan of service (pps), subsequent visit
Physician telephone patient service, 21-30 minutes of medical discussion
New patient office or other outpatient visit, typically 45 minutes
Remote monitoring of physiologic parameters management services, 20 minutes or more of qualified health care professional time per calendar month
Physician telephone patient service, 11-20 minutes of medical discussion
Electrocardiogram (ecg) up to 30 days continuous with transmission of patient triggered events with review and report by health care professional
Chronic care management services for two or more chronic conditions, additional 20 minutes of clinical staff time directed by health care professional, per calendar month

Physician certification for medicare-covered home health  services under a home health plan of care (patient not present), including contacts with home health agency and review of reports of patient status required by physicians to affirm the initial imple
Established patient office or other outpatient visit, typically 5 minutes
Routine EKG using at least 12 leads including interpretation and report
Annual depression screening, 15 minutes
Initial preventive physical examination; face-to-face visit, services limited to new beneficiary during the first 12 months of medicare enrollment
Remote monitoring of physiologic parameters, initial set-up and patient education on use of equipment
Established patient office or other outpatient, visit typically 40 minutes
Transitional care management services for problem of at least moderate complexity

Remote physiologic monitoring treatment management services, health care professional time in a calendar month requiring interactive communication with the patient/caregiver; each additional 20 minute
